select receivedPayment.receive_payment_id as obj_id , project.project_id,project.project_name,project.project_no ,project.deptid as dept_id, '收入' as amount_type, '到款记录' as business_type, '10' as business_sort, receivedPayment.receive_payment_amount as amount, receivedPayment.receive_payment_month as use_month, receivedPayment.receive_payment_datetime as pay_date, dd_rai.dic_data_name as otherdesc, receivedPayment.description, receivedPayment.payment_unit as business_name , receivedPayment.receivable_accounts_item_id as type_id , receivedPayment.build_datetime , '' as staff_id from tb_received_payment receivedPayment INNER JOIN vb_project project on receivedPayment.project_id = project.project_id INNER join ts_dic_data dd_rai on receivedPayment.receivable_accounts_item_id = dd_rai.id where receivedPayment.verify_userid is not null

select rp.receive_payment_id as obj_id , project.project_id,project.project_name,project.project_no ,project.deptid as dept_id, '收入' as amount_type, '到款记录' as business_type, '11' as business_sort, rp.amount, rp.statement_month as use_month, IFNULL(rp.pay_date,str_to_date(rp.statement_month*100+01,'%Y%m%d')) as pay_date, dd_rai.dic_data_name as otherdesc, rp.description, rp.payment_unit as business_name , rp.receivable_accounts_item_id as type_id , rp.build_datetime , '' as staff_id from vb_received_payment_monthly rp INNER JOIN vb_project project on rp.project_id = project.project_id INNER join ts_dic_data dd_rai on rp.receivable_accounts_item_id = dd_rai.id

select receivedPayment.receive_payment_id as obj_id , project.project_id,project.project_name,project.project_no ,project.deptid as dept_id, '收入' as amount_type, '未核实到款记录' as business_type, '12' as business_sort, receivedPayment.receive_payment_amount as amount, receivedPayment.receive_payment_month as use_month, receivedPayment.receive_payment_datetime as pay_date, dd_rai.dic_data_name as otherdesc, receivedPayment.description, receivedPayment.payment_unit as business_name , receivedPayment.receivable_accounts_item_id as type_id , receivedPayment.build_datetime , '' as staff_id from tb_received_payment receivedPayment INNER JOIN vb_project project on receivedPayment.project_id = project.project_id INNER join ts_dic_data dd_rai on receivedPayment.receivable_accounts_item_id = dd_rai.id where receivedPayment.verify_userid is null

select receivedPayment.receive_payment_id as obj_id , project.project_id,project.project_name,project.project_no ,project.deptid as dept_id, '收入' as amount_type, '到款记录' as business_type, '10' as business_sort, receivedPayment.receive_payment_amount as amount, DATE_FORMAT(receivedPayment.receive_payment_datetime,'%Y%m') as use_month, receivedPayment.receive_payment_datetime as pay_date, dd_rai.dic_data_name as otherdesc, receivedPayment.description, receivedPayment.payment_unit as business_name , receivedPayment.receivable_accounts_item_id as type_id , receivedPayment.build_datetime , '' as staff_id from tb_received_payment receivedPayment INNER JOIN vb_project project on receivedPayment.project_id = project.project_id INNER join ts_dic_data dd_rai on receivedPayment.receivable_accounts_item_id = dd_rai.id where receivedPayment.verify_userid is not null

select receivedPayment.receive_payment_id as obj_id , project.project_id,project.project_name,project.project_no ,project.deptid as dept_id, '收入' as amount_type, '未核实到款记录' as business_type, '14' as business_sort, receivedPayment.receive_payment_amount as amount, DATE_FORMAT(receivedPayment.receive_payment_datetime,'%Y%m') as use_month, receivedPayment.receive_payment_datetime as pay_date, dd_rai.dic_data_name as otherdesc, receivedPayment.description, receivedPayment.payment_unit as business_name , receivedPayment.receivable_accounts_item_id as type_id , receivedPayment.build_datetime , '' as staff_id from tb_received_payment receivedPayment INNER JOIN vb_project project on receivedPayment.project_id = project.project_id INNER join ts_dic_data dd_rai on receivedPayment.receivable_accounts_item_id = dd_rai.id where receivedPayment.verify_userid is null

SELECT ms.monthly_statement_id as obj_id, project.project_id,project.project_name, project.project_no , project.deptid as dept_id, '收入' as amount_type, '月度结算单' as business_type, '20' as business_sort, ms.amount,ms.statement_month as use_month, str_to_date(ms.statement_month*100+01,'%Y%m%d') as pay_date, '' as otherdesc, ms.description, (case when statement_type='1' then '外包结算' when statement_type='2' then '外派结算' when statement_type='3' then '历史结算' else '其它结算' end) as business_name, '' as type_id , ms.build_datetime , '' as staff_id FROM tb_monthly_statement ms inner join vb_project project on ms.project_id = project.project_id left join (SELECT need_approve,data_id FROM tb_apply_approve where delete_flag='0' and need_approve='1' and data_type = 'MONTHLY_STATEMENT' group by data_id) aa on ms.monthly_statement_id = aa.data_id where ms.verify_userid is not null

SELECT ms.monthly_statement_id as obj_id, project.project_id,project.project_name, project.project_no , project.deptid as dept_id, '收入' as amount_type, '月度结算单' as business_type, '21' as business_sort, detail.total_cost*(1-${Statistics.tax_rate}) as amount,ms.statement_month as use_month, str_to_date(ms.statement_month*100+01,'%Y%m%d') as pay_date, '' as otherdesc, ms.description, (case when statement_type='1' then '外包结算' when statement_type='2' then '外派结算' when statement_type='3' then '历史结算' else '其它结算' end) as business_name, detail.staff_id as type_id , ms.build_datetime , '' as staff_id FROM tb_monthly_statement ms inner join tb_monthly_statement_detail detail on ms.monthly_statement_id = detail.monthly_statement_id inner join vb_project project on ms.project_id = project.project_id where ms.verify_userid is not null

SELECT ms.monthly_statement_id as obj_id, project.project_id,project.project_name, project.project_no , project.deptid as dept_id, '收入' as amount_type, '未核实月度结算单' as business_type, '22' as business_sort, ms.amount,ms.statement_month as use_month, str_to_date(ms.statement_month*100+01,'%Y%m%d') as pay_date, '' as otherdesc, ms.description, (case when statement_type='1' then '外包结算' when statement_type='2' then '外派结算' when statement_type='3' then '历史结算' else '其它结算' end) as business_name, '' as type_id , ms.build_datetime , '' as staff_id FROM tb_monthly_statement ms inner join vb_project project on ms.project_id = project.project_id left join (SELECT need_approve,data_id FROM tb_apply_approve where delete_flag='0' and need_approve='1' and data_type = 'MONTHLY_STATEMENT' group by data_id) aa on ms.monthly_statement_id = aa.data_id where ms.verify_userid is null

select rc.reimburse_id as obj_id, rc.project_id, project_name,project_no, project.deptid as dept_id, '成本' as amount_type, '报销' as business_type, '30' as business_sort, rc.amount,rc.use_month, rc.pay_date, dd_rai.dic_data_name as otherdesc, rc.description, (case when staff.staff_name is NULL then rc.staff_id else staff.staff_name end) as business_name, rc.pay_item_id as type_id, rc.build_datetime , rc.staff_id from tb_reimburse_costs rc INNER JOIN vb_project project on rc.project_id = project.project_id left join ts_dic_data dd_rai on rc.pay_item_id = dd_rai.id left JOIN tb_staff_costs staff on rc.staff_id = staff.staff_id where rc.delete_flag = '0' and rc.verify_userid is not null

select rc.reimburse_id as obj_id, rc.project_id, project_name,project_no, project.deptid as dept_id, '成本' as amount_type, '报销' as business_type, '31' as business_sort, rc.amount,rc.use_month, rc.pay_date, dd_rai.dic_data_name as otherdesc, rc.description, (case when staff.staff_name is NULL then rc.staff_id else staff.staff_name end) as business_name, staff.staff_id as type_id, rc.build_datetime , rc.staff_id from tb_reimburse_costs rc INNER JOIN vb_project project on rc.project_id = project.project_id left join ts_dic_data dd_rai on rc.pay_item_id = dd_rai.id INNER JOIN tb_staff_costs staff on rc.staff_id = staff.staff_id where rc.delete_flag = '0' and rc.verify_userid is not null

select pe.project_expend_id as obj_id, pe.project_id, project_name,project_no, project.deptid as dept_id, '成本' as amount_type, '项目付款信息' as business_type, '40' as business_sort, case when (pe.actual_cost is NULL OR pe.actual_cost = 0) then pe.amount else pe.actual_cost end as amount, pe.use_month, pe.pay_date , pe.sub_contractor_no as otherdesc,pe.description, sub_contractor_name as business_name , '' as type_id , pe.build_datetime , '' as staff_id from tb_project_expend pe INNER JOIN vb_project project on pe.project_id = project.project_id WHERE pe.delete_flag = '0' and pe.verify_userid is not null

select pe.project_expend_id as obj_id, pe.project_id, project_name,project_no, project.deptid as dept_id, '成本' as amount_type, '项目付款信息' as business_type, '41' as business_sort, pe.actual_cost as amount,pe.use_month, pe.pay_date , pe.sub_contractor_no as otherdesc,pe.description, sub_contractor_name as business_name , '' as type_id , pe.build_datetime , '' as staff_id from tb_project_expend pe INNER JOIN vb_project project on pe.project_id = project.project_id WHERE pe.delete_flag = '0' and pe.verify_userid is not null and pay_date is not null

select pe.project_expend_id as obj_id, pe.project_id, project_name,project_no, project.deptid as dept_id, '成本' as amount_type, '项目付款信息' as business_type, '42' as business_sort, pep.actual_cost as amount,DATE_FORMAT(pep.pay_date,'%Y%m') as use_month, pep.pay_date , pep.invoiceno as otherdesc,pep.description, sub_contractor_name as business_name , '' as type_id , pe.build_datetime , '' as staff_id from tb_project_expend_pay pep inner join tb_project_expend pe on pep.project_expend_id = pe.project_expend_id INNER JOIN vb_project project on pe.project_id = project.project_id WHERE pe.delete_flag = '0' and pe.verify_userid is not null and pep.verify_userid is not null

select psc.project_staffcost_id as obj_id, psc.project_id ,project.project_name,project.project_no, project.deptid as dept_id, '成本' as amount_type, '项目人员成本' as business_type, '50' as business_sort, psc.amount, psc.work_month as use_month ,psc.pay_date, '' as otherdesc, '' as description, staff.staff_name as business_name , '' as type_id, psc.build_datetime , psc.staff_id from tb_project_staff_cost psc INNER JOIN vb_project project on psc.project_id = project.project_id inner join tb_staff_costs staff on psc.staff_id = staff.staff_id

select psc.project_staffcost_id as obj_id, psc.project_id ,project.project_name,project.project_no,project.deptid as dept_id, '成本' as amount_type, '项目人员成本' as business_type, '51' as business_sort, psc.all_amount as amount, psc.work_month as use_month ,psc.pay_date, '' as otherdesc, '' as description, staff.staff_name as business_name , '' as type_id , psc.build_datetime , psc.staff_id from tb_project_staff_cost psc INNER JOIN vb_project project on psc.project_id = project.project_id inner join tb_staff_costs staff on psc.staff_id = staff.staff_id

select psc.salary_id as obj_id, psc.project_id ,project.project_name,project.project_no,project.deptid as dept_id, '成本' as amount_type, '人员工资' as business_type, '60' as business_sort, ( psc.should_salary+psc.endowment_insurance_bycompany+psc.medical_insurance_bycompany+ psc.losejob_insurance_bycompany+psc.maternity_insurance_bycompany+psc.jobharm_insurance_bycompany+ psc.reservefund_bypcompany+psc.overdue_tax_salary+psc.actual_bonus ) as amount, psc.salary_month as use_month , DATE_ADD(str_to_date(psc.salary_month*100+20,'%Y%m%d'),INTERVAL 1 month) as pay_date, '' as otherdesc, psc.description as description, staff.staff_name as business_name , psc.staff_id as type_id , psc.build_datetime , psc.staff_id from tb_salary psc INNER JOIN vb_project project on psc.project_id = project.project_id inner join tb_staff_costs staff on psc.staff_id = staff.staff_id and psc.verify_userid is not null

select invoice.invoice_id as obj_id, invoice.project_id ,project.project_name,project.project_no,project.deptid as dept_id, '成本' as amount_type, '发票' as business_type, '70' as business_sort, invoice.invoiceno_amount as amount, date_format(invoice.invoice_date, '%Y%m') as use_month , invoice.invoice_date as pay_date, '' as otherdesc, invoice.description as description, invoice.invoice_no as business_name , '' as type_id , invoice.build_datetime , invoice.invoice_staff_id as staff_id from tb_invoice invoice INNER JOIN vb_project project on invoice.project_id = project.project_id where invoice.verify_userid is not null
